category: Miscellaneous Symbols And Pictographs -> Emoji modifiers
definition: The Male Pilot, Type-4 emoji is a sequence of the ?? Man, ?? Emoji Modifier Fitzpatrick Type-4, ? Airplane and ? Variation Selector-16 emoji http://emojipedia.org/male-pilot-type-4/
name: man pilot: medium skin tone

bn:00002306n: Person actively involved in flying an aircraft
A person who flies or navigates an aircraft
A person who is in charge of the controls of an aircraft.
An aircraft pilot is an aviator who actively and directly operates the directional flight controls of an aircraft while in flight.
Someone who is licensed to operate an aircraft in flight
A person who flies an aircraft.

bn:00001533n: Sexual maturity is the age or stage when an organism can reproduce.
The age or stage when an organism can reproduce
A man is a male human.
An adult human member of the sex that begets young by fertilizing ova.
A human member of the masculine sex or gender.
An adult person who is male (as opposed to a woman)

bn:00001697n: An aircraft that has a fixed wing and is powered by propellers or jets
A powered heavier-than-air aircraft with fixed wings.
An airplane or aeroplane is a powered, fixed-wing aircraft that is propelled forward by thrust from a jet engine or propeller.
A powered heavier-than-air aircraft with fixed wings that obtains lift by the Bernoulli effect and is used for transportation.
Powered aircraft capable of flight using fixed wings that generate lift
